subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: MacIntyre was the SEC coach of the year and received the Bobby Dodd Coach of the Year Award for the 1982 season, when he guided the Commodores to an 8-4 record.
snippet: MacIntyre was the SEC coach of the year and received the Bobby Dodd Coach of the Year Award for the 1982 season, when he guided the Commodores to an 8-4 record.
